name: LDJam: Cat-amorphasis
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 35: Shapeshift

Catamorphasis is a game about how cats can become any shape when they sleep. Levels are: Catloaf, Egyptian Sphinx, and Peek-a-boo.

How to play:

Move the cat toys with your mouse to move the limbs on the cat try to shift him into the state in the picture on the right before time runs out.

FAQ:

Did you just make a game just to show off your cat?

Yes, yes I did. That and IK is a funny gag.

Don't you have another cat?

Yes, but she is shy therefore harder to take pictures of than he is, here they are together,

Ideas that got cut?

Having a boredom meter where you had to pet the cat and then mice would slide down. IK the cats spine for all sorts of weird yoga poses.

Blog of funny screenshots incoming on: http://www.MollyJameson.com
